title: How do we distinguish a dream from a vision?

preview.html: Therefore, we find many of them wondering: How do we distinguish a dream from a vision? What is the definition of a vision and a dream in the eyes of scholars? We will find the answers to the questions in the following lines, so fill in with us until the end through the website gptafser.com/. What is the meaning of a dream? Before answering, how do you differentiate between a dream and a vision? First: It is necessary to know the meaning of the dream and its correct outcome, as scholars have known in the books of jurisprudence and religion and the interpretation of the dream as follows: Next: The dreams and scenes that the dreamer sees in his sleep are the reason for his fear and panic of sleep. Because it is one of Satan’s dreams, where Satan controls dreams, which leads to achieving his goal and the dreamer’s fear. But scholars and jurists warned us that dreams are controlled by Satan, we must seek refuge in God From the accursed Satan. In the event that the dreamer wakes up during the dream, he must seek refuge and spit on his left side three times. The dreamer must not talk to anyone about the dream and be silent, and must not imitate it to anyone near or far. In the event that you see a dream, it is advised that you pray in two groups. Only, this prevents you from a lot and brings you goodness, God willing. See also: What is a dream? What is the meaning of a vision? It means a vision that a person sees in his sleep something that he lived his life wishing for from God Almighty. He achieved it in his dream and it can be achieved in reality. , so it became a vision. The meaning of the vision is also a sign that Almighty God brings to a person in his dream about the kindness of a relative who heralds good news to him in this world. The vision may serve as a warning to the pioneer that the worst will happen in the coming period. The thing is also good for him, because God brought symbols in dreams. It is recommended to pay attention to this problem in the coming period. The goodness that appears in the dreamer’s dream may be a sign for him or for a friend or relative. Likewise, a warning about evil or danger in a dream indicates that the dreamer is far away from this undesirable matter. It could be a sign In the presence of a close friend or family member. If the dream comes true, you must thank God Almighty and tell your family and those closest to your heart to witness your vision and its fulfillment. Consider turning to God and following the Sunnah and the Holy Qur’an to be among those with the true vision. How do we distinguish a dream from a vision? We also talked at the beginning of the topic about the question that confused many people and filled Google search sites, how to distinguish between a dream and a vision, and the answer came as follows: The speed of the viewer’s attention: The dreamer wakes up from his sleep remembering what happened to him in the dream, even if the dreamer was asleep. As for the dream The dreamer does not have the speed of attention, as he forgets everything he dreams about in his sleep as soon as he wakes up from his sleep. The dream also comes to the dreamer's dream through fears and hallucinations, which leads to the person waking up from sleep in fear and in this case seeking refuge from Satan by changing your sleeping position. What is striking is that the dreamer remembers his dream or half of it. Read also: Reasons for the large number of dreams of true visual signs. The signs of the true vision have not yet been proven and no clear statement has been issued yet, but religious and jurisprudential scholars have shown us some signs and symbols that indicate the validity of the vision, including the following:

title: Interpretation of a dream about losing a ring: seeing a lost ring in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of losing an engagement ring and ring in a dream for a single girl, for a fiancée, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man. Losing an engagement ring in a dream is one of the most frightening and disturbing dreams for women and men when they see it in a dream, in order to know the details of the dream correctly. Many also interpret it as evidence of separation from the fiancé or divorce and other wrong meanings that exist in life. The translator Ibn Sirin explained to us in his various interpretations many meanings and connotations of seeing the loss of an engagement ring in a dream, which he explained to all people, which differs from one person to another, depending on the situation. Dreamer. Interpretation of losing an engagement ring in a dream. Losing an engagement ring in a dream indicates problems that the dreamer will face. Seeing an engaged girl who lost her bride in a dream means that she will suffer for a period of time with her fiancé. Losing the fiancé’s engagement ring, but searching for it in the dream, is evidence On the great happiness that you will have in the near future. Searching for an engagement ring that has lost some of it indicates getting rid of the problems of engagement or marriage. A pregnant woman who wears a ring on her finger in a dream indicates the gender of the baby. If the ring is made of gold, it indicates the birth of a child. If it is silver, it indicates the birth of a female. Wearing a gemstone ring in a dream means a happy and secure life since birth. Losing an engagement ring from his fiancée in a dream is evidence of a difficult situation that the dreamer is going through. The duration of finding a ring in a dream indicates the duration of problems that the person will suffer from. Seeing an engagement ring Lost in a dream Losing an engagement ring in a dream is evidence of problems that the dreamer will face and some bad things that he must reject. For her fiancée to see that her ring was lost in a dream and she did not look for it, this is evidence that there are people close to her who are trying to create problems for her. Losing a ring is A golden marriage in a dream is evidence of big problems that will arise. Breaking an engagement ring in a dream is evidence of separation from the fiancée. Interpretation of losing an engagement ring in a dream: A married woman lost her engagement ring in a dream, a sign of difficult family problems that she will face. Losing an engagement ring in a married woman’s dream indicates Also to exhaustion and extreme exhaustion in the near future. Interpretation of finding an engagement ring in a dream. Finding an engagement ring after losing in a dream is evidence of problems that will be resolved soon. Finding a ring in a dream also indicates upcoming changes in the dreamer’s life. Finding an engagement ring in a ring shows Engagement is also the happiness that he will obtain. Interpretation of losing an engagement ring in a dream for a fiancée. When the ring is lost by the fiancée or fiancé, it leads to the loss of happiness or comfort for a period. But if the search was short and ended with its discovery, then the sadness or problems will have only a little time and will quickly disappear and take its place. Great happiness. In general, its loss indicates the entry into something unpleasant

title: Interpretation of a dream about glasses by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about glasses can be evidence of many interpretations related to the dreamer’s life, according to the details of his dream. One may dream that glasses are new and shiny, or that he will buy some glasses, or that he will receive them from someone as a gift or give them, and other dreams may come to the person. Interpretation of a dream about glasses: A dream about clean glass cups could be evidence of the arrival of kindness and halal food to the dreamer, and thus of The dreamer should rejoice gently, work hard and pray to God a lot for success and payment. To dream of unclean glass, it could portend that he is suffering from worries and that the dreamer should do everything in his power to get rid of anxiety and return to stability and happiness again by the will of the Most Merciful. A person may dream of broken glass cups, and this may indicate a lot of spending and extravagance, and that the dreamer must be careful with his money and not spend it on earning, and pray to God to bless him in his diet. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Dreaming of glass cups filled with tea may foretell abundant money that will come to the dreamer and that he must be careful about it and not spend it in forbidden ways. Interpretation of a dream about glasses by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that glasses in a dream could be evidence of a new job that the dreamer may enter into. The near future, if the glasses are empty in the dream and to dream of glasses and wash them, it can indicate the health that the dreamer enjoys and which he must maintain and be pleased by God Almighty. Washing glass also symbolizes a stable emotional life. As for the dream of a cup falling from the glass, it foretells problems and a difficult period, and the dreamer must make every effort to get rid of the crises, and of course ask for God’s help and ask Him for what will almost comfort him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about glasses for single women. A dream about cups can be interpreted Glass for an unmarried girl as a sign of safety that may come to the god in the near future and therefore she should remember God often and pray for protection from evil or a dream of a cup can indicate the ambition that the dreamer is looking for for her and that she should not stop trying no matter what. The difficulty you are facing, and of course you must rely on God in every new step you take. The sleeping person can see the glass cup in the dream being filled with water, and this can be good news for her with joy and happiness in the neighborhood. Someone may propose to her, and here she seeks help from God Almighty in her matter to guide her to goodness, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream in a dream: A married woman’s dream of empty cups may symbolize a feeling of loneliness and the need for bonding and help, and therefore she should approach her husband and talk to him about it. She prays to God Almighty for goodness for them or the dream could indicate. A feeling of lack of money. As for dreaming of glass cups filled with water, it can indicate an imminent pregnancy, and therefore the dreamer must have good news about what is to come. A woman may dream of glasses while putting them on, and here a dream about glasses may indicate the abundance of sustenance that he may gain.

title: Interpretation of mathematics in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: In the following article, the Encyclopedia presents the interpretation of mathematics in a dream, which is one of the common visions that greatly haunt the sleeper, whether male or female, young or old. He is dried out and cannot answer in order to pass the test. As for mathematics, it is no secret to us that although it requires concentration And in order to understand it and memorize its rules due to its multiple branches, it nevertheless has important roles in life and is the basis of many things, the first of which is developing intelligence and expanding perception, and in the following paragraphs we will provide explanations for seeing it in different situations. Interpretation of mathematics in a dream, and by analogy with what the scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned, we present You have the following interpretations: An exam in a dream is a test and torment that the dreamer goes through, and when the subject is mathematics, it shows his attempt to find a logical and reasonable solution. The dreamer being able to skip the exam and pass it indicates his patience with the trials he is going through and that God Almighty will remove the calamity from him soon. The fortuneteller who tests another person in mathematics shows his efforts to find out what is inside that person's chest and what is hidden in his heart and mind. Success in the test symbolizes overcoming a difficult situation and overcoming the problem that the fortuneteller fell into and that his condition will be for the better. Meeting the mathematics teacher, talking to him and shaking his hand indicates Closeness to God and the desire to memorize His Holy Book. Sometimes the meaning of seeing this dream is the psychological state that the dreamer is going through, anxiety and preoccupation with his thinking, a matter for which he cannot find a solution or a decision that he cannot make. Interpretation of solving mathematical problems in a dream for a single woman: A woman’s vision of this The dream has different interpretations, which we explain in the following points: The mathematics teacher in one dream indicates marriage to a person who has wisdom and reason. It indicates her attempt to overcome something that is difficult for her to find a solution for, which is causing him psychological problems. Her ability to pass the test indicates that she She will overcome difficulties and achieve her desires in the near future. Delay in achieving the test indicates delay in achieving what you want, such as delay in engagement or marriage, or delay in obtaining a job, and reaching the end of the dream is good news for ending this delay by achieving what you desire. Interpretation A dream about solving mathematical problems for a married woman: A married woman may dream that she is taking a mathematics test. Therefore, in the following paragraph, we provide the interpretation of seeing this dream: Performing this test sometimes symbolizes an imminent pregnancy. The difficulty in solving problems shows that in marital life she suffers from problems for which she cannot find a solution. Her ability to solve these issues symbolizes the extent of her rationality in managing affairs. Her home and her life. Thus we have reached the end of our article in which we have presented all the interpretations related to seeing mathematics in a dream through what dream interpretation scholars have narrated and the interpretations they have given to it. It does not rely on confirmed indications from Islamic law, and to interpret another dream, you can enter through the direct dream interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream or dreams by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq via the vision website Roy2a.com. It could be a warning or a warning against the appearance of evil, and interpreters have differed in interpreting the vision of a crocodile, whether she is single, married, pregnant, or divorced, with its various meanings. Today, through a vision website, you will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin or Ibn Sirin. Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: The crocodile in a dream is a symbol of worries and sorrows. Seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates that the viewer is exposed to deception and deception and the large number of hypocrites around him. Dreaming of a crocodile in a dream may symbolize a greedy, oppressed merchant. If he dreams One is that he kills a crocodile, it is evidence of victory over enemies and their completion. Seeing a crocodile dragging someone into the water indicates that she will be robbed or damaged. Dreaming of turning into a crocodile is a sign of immorality and debauchery. See also: Interpretation of seeing feces from cats, animals, or mice in a dream. Surviving a crocodile in a dream: Seeing a crocodile in a dream and escaping from it is a guide to overcoming problems and getting out of crises. A crocodile’s dream of survival is a sign of getting rid of enemies and surviving conspiracies. What is the interpretation of a dream of a crocodile bite by a married woman? A dream of a crocodile bite for a married woman is a message to her that she should care about many things that She tries to ignore it. If he sees a married woman in her dream, swimming in the water with a crocodile, she needs more love and attention. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bull in a dream. Seeing a large crocodile in a dream for a single woman: Dreaming of a large crocodile in a dream. It symbolizes the presence of a corrupt person or a thief in the life of a single woman. The dreamer. Seeing a large crocodile in one dream is a sign of severe mistreatment. What is the interpretation of a dream about a crocodile eating a child: A dream about a crocodile eating a child in a dream is evidence of cunning and deception. A crocodile eating a child in a dream is evidence of failure and loss of goals and dreams. Seeing a crocodile in a child’s mouth is a sign of insecurity and loss. Comfort and stability. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile attack: A dream about a crocodile attacking the dream. It indicates that the dreamer does many bad things and is afraid of punishment. See the crocodile attack, a symbol of cunning and hypocrisy. Seeing the crocodile attacking the fortune-teller and his attempt to escape from it indicates that the dreamer is exposed To a crisis or fall into the hands of a policeman. A dead crocodile in a dream: Seeing a dead crocodile in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy in the dreamer’s life called friendship and closeness to him. Dreaming of seeing many dead crocodiles in a dream is evidence that you are being harmed and cheated by a relative or friend. It could be Seeing a dead crocodile in a dream means for the viewer who is exposed to physical harm and psychological exhaustion because of those close to him. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cat attacking in a dream. We are happy to see your dreams received about “Interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream” through comments, and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

We are happy to see your dreams received about “Interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream” through comments, and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of watching cinema in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of watching a cinema in a dream: If a man sees a cinema in a dream, this means that he will achieve all his goals that he was trying to achieve, God willing. If he goes to the cinema in his dream, this vision indicates the bright and wonderful future that awaits the viewer. Then, seeing the sleeper in a dream going to the cinema with his friend indicates On the love and tenderness that unites them, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. What does watching an unmarried young man go to the movies with his girlfriend in a dream mean is that the dreamer will marry this girl soon. Interpretation of a dream about movie tickets in a dream by Ibn SirinIf the dreamer sees a cinema in his dream, then this dream indicates the dreamer’s ambition and desire to Looking forward to a better future. Then the vision of going with a friend to the movies appears in the dream, because of the strong relationship that connects both people and God is higher and knows best. Film festivals indicate in the dreamer’s dream that he is a person who is unfair to his parents, so he should seek his parents’ approval. Hence, the vision The red carpet in the cinema indicates the arrival of goodness, wonderful living, abundant livelihood, and abundance of money and offspring. Interpretation of a dream about working in the cinema for a married woman: If a married woman sees that entering the cinema in a dream, this vision indicates the arrival of kindness, abundant living and abundant money. It is as if she saw a sad movie in the cinema, This means that she will face many consequences and problems in her life. Seeing a comedy movie in a woman’s dream symbolizes family stability and marital happiness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Hence, seeing a movie screen in a married woman’s dream indicates her feeling of security, stability, prosperity, love and tenderness. Interpretation of a dream about a film festival in Dreams symbolize watching a film festival. In a fortuneteller’s dream, the dreamer will travel soon for work, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing him walking on the red carpet that he walks at festivals means that the dreamer will receive a lot of money. If one sees that he has won the Best Actor Award in a dream, This means that he will get a promotion in his workplace. Then seeing a film festival in a dream means that the fortuneteller will achieve great success in his academic and professional life, God willing. Interpretation of dreams for scenes of horror films in a dream for a single woman. If a person sees a horror film in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s failure and bad mood, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. But if the dreamer sees a detective movie in the dream, then this vision indicates the dreamer's feeling of safety, security, confidence, and happiness. Then it symbolizes the viewing of a movie. Moving in the dream means that the dreamer is doing bad and unwanted actions and that his behavior is not normal. Seeing a sleeping person in an old romantic movie in a dream It means that the dreamer is suffering from sadness, despair, and extreme disappointment. Interpretation of a dream about acting in a movie in a dream for a single woman. If a single girl sees that she is entering a movie theater in a dream, this vision indicates that her life will change for the better. If she watches a dramatic movie in a dream, this vision shows the dreamer’s feelings Bored, disappointed and hopeless. They symbolize the watching girl goes

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about chicks in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about chicksInterpretation of a dream about chicks This dream in a dream is one of the dreams that does not cause distress or a negative feeling when waking up from the dream, because chicks are small and beautiful birds, but in any case it is a vision that needs interpretation. People who dream of this dream begin to reveal the secret and its meaning. Interpretation of a dream of chicks in a dream When we interpret the vision of chicks in a dream, we can refer to the opinions of all scholars and interpreters who have an opinion on this dream, and some may also see the chick in their dreams, which is unrelated Directly with chicks, and this will clarify the interpretation of chicks in a dream. When a person plays with chicks during his sleep, this indicates, from the point of view of many scholars who specialize in dream interpretation, that God will give this person children and spend enjoyable times with them. Putting food for chicks in a dream indicates That the dreamer has a kind soul and a heart full of love and tenderness for all people and spares no effort to help others whenever he can. The presence of a chick next to chicks in a dream indicates the presence of a person close to insight. However, he will be exposed to harm from his hands, so he must take caution. It could The presence of chicks in the dreamer’s dream is a sign that the dreamer will soon have a wife and that she will perform all her household chores perfectly. But if a man eats food from chicken in his dream, this is a sign for him that there is evil awaiting him. Interpretation of a dream about a chick in a dream by Ibn Sirino and Imam Ibn Sirin An important point of view in this vision can be clarified through a number of points: The chicks in the vision, from Ibn Sirin’s point of view, indicate money that comes with diligence and diligence. Seeing them indicates joy, pleasure, escaping from problems and overcoming them. Its presence in a person’s vision often symbolizes He will be the owner of a large project without effort or fatigue. The Sheikh showed that the owner of the vision can be a person with a good reputation, known in their communities for his noble conduct. If a person suffers from hardship, this indicates that money comes to him from where he does not expect it, and that his distress will soon go away. God willing. When a sick person sees chicks in his sleep, it is good news that he will soon recover from his illness. Between him and his rival, he saw chicks in a dream, and this indicates the end of the dispute between them. When you put food for chicks in a dream, it shows the bonding of spouses, family harmony, and the strengthening of relationships between them. A chick in a vision is a wish that will come true soon as long as he wishes. A person who sees himself playing with someone, this can be an indication that he will have a child and play with him and enjoy his time playing with him. Interpretation of a dream about chicks in a single woman’s dream. Chicks in one dream is generally considered evidence For success and goodness, and when the chick hatches from the egg in her dream, this indicates her departure from her father’s house to her future husband’s house, which will come true. In the near future. The bachelor’s yellow chick indicates the achievement of some of the goals and ambitions that he seeks to achieve. If she sees that she is slaughtering a chick, this indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing the jinn in the form of a woman in a dream

preview.html: We offer you an interpretation of seeing jeans in a dream in the form of a woman, as seeing jeans in a dream is one of the things that makes the dreamer fear and panic, and he feels that he will fall into a narrow ordeal because of this dream, and we are in a hurry to know the interpretation of this dream, and through the lines of this article from the Encyclopedia we will learn about it in detail according to what dream interpretation scholars said about seeing jeans in a dream in the form of a woman. Interpretation of seeing the jinn in a dream in the form of a woman Interpretation of seeing the jinn in a dream inside the house A man sees in a dream that there is a jinn in his house, and the man who in the dream felt fear and anxiety for his wife and children from this jinn, so he read the Qur’an to him, and this led him to leave, this dream means that the dreamer will suffer from material problems that affect his family during the period and that thinking a lot about this matter causes him anxiety. And if he wakes up from his sleep and repeats these verses, let him remember these verses well and continue reading them in his time, as these verses save him from his worries or worries. If a woman sees in her dream that there is a jinn in her house and begins to read the Qur’an and reading it leads to the burning of the jinn or its departure, this indicates that this woman must read the Qur’an Always. And keep reading because it is the only way for her to get out of the crises that she may face in her life. Seeing the jinn in a dream in human form and reading the Qur’an Whoever sees in a dream that the jinn are gathering around him while reading the Qur’an, this dream is good news for the dreamer that he will reach a high position and high status among people and will have many souls. Some commentators said in the interpretation of seeing the jinn in the form of a man in a dream, that this dream means that the dreamer will go through some financial problems or difficulties in his life that will affect him negatively. Jeans in a dream in the form of a woman Whoever sees in a dream a jinn and this genie was in the form of a woman, the interpreters said in the dream that this dream is a warning to the man of his continued neglect and weakness towards his wife and that he must take care of her, listen to her and help her in her life in various ways and forms and he must share her life and include her with him in his life and stop the deliberate neglect that he inflicts on her. Some commentators said that seeing jeans in the form of a woman in a dream means that there is a famous woman in this man’s life and that this woman wants to fall into what God has forbidden: his life. Ibn Sirin says that a person who sees in a dream that there is a jinn in the form of a woman, this dream It warns him that there are people in his life who are trying to harm him and damage his reputation. One of the good visions for a man is that he sees in his dream that he is marrying a jinn in the form of a woman, because this dream promises him that he will be able to achieve what he wants in life, after he makes the effort he can do. It was mentioned in the interpretation of seeing a jinn in the form of a woman that this dream indicates the presence of enemies in the dreamer's life who envy him for what God has provided him with. The meaning of this dream may be that there is magic that has been done to the dreamer to harm him, so he must maintain remembrance in his daily life, as well as reading the Qur’an and maintaining the performance of the ritual prayer.

title: Interpretation of eating chocolate in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating chocolate in a dream Adults and children tend to eat chocolate and feel happy and joyful while eating it, and this is despite its different types, and seeing it in a dream, the dreamer feels pleasure and believes that the dream is a good sign for him, so what is the meaning of eating chocolate in a dream and what are the interpretations related to it? Eating Chocolate in a dream Eating chocolate in a dream It can be said that the interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate has many connotations depending on the dreamer’s circumstances and gender, and seeing it in a dream is generally a sign of the arrival of joy, happiness, and the end of worries. Pains. A woman may experience many happy moments in the context of seeing family and friends eating them in a dream, and she may hear some news coming from her work that will lead to a new promotion and a higher salary. If a man sees that he is buying different types of chocolate in a dream, he will likely meet two owners. New people will fill his life with happiness and love. As for eating dark chocolate, it is interpreted as good for the dreamer, as the causes of happiness will come to his home and his conditions will stabilize, God willing. If the student sees that he is eating chocolate while he is happy, then it is good that he will succeed in his studies and complete it to the best of his ability. Eating chocolate in A dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that the dreamer who sees himself eating chocolate in a dream will obtain food from the widest of doors without having to put a lot of effort into it. If a man sees that he is buying chocolate for his wife and giving it to her in his dream, this is one of the most important meanings of love and friendship between them and promises them continuity. This warm and beautiful relationship. There are some interpretations related to seeing chocolate according to its color. For example, white chocolate is a sign of success in studies or work. While black is a sign of the end of tension and sorrows and the beginning of happy and joyful days that differ from the previous days. Perhaps this vision indicates for an unmarried girl However, she will get married soon, so if she sees a specific person giving her chocolate in a dream, it is expected that she will have a relationship with this person in reality. As for the fortuneteller losing the chocolate or spoiling it, it is not a good omen, as things will get worse after this vision and the lovers may separate. And when she eats a cube One chocolate, the dream is interpreted very well, especially for single women, because it is one of the sure signs of a close marriage with someone you love. Eating chocolate in a dream for a single woman. Many interpretations are related to eating chocolate in a dream for an unmarried woman and it is an interpretation of her close marriage to a rich man that will make Her days are happy. If she sees a specific man giving her chocolate in a dream, this can be interpreted that she will communicate with this person in reality and God knows best. The interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate indicates for an unmarried woman if she works in a specific profession or works that her profits and gains in this work will be great And that her condition would improve if there were some things that caused her sadness. If she sees herself offering chocolate to her father or mother in her dream, this is confirmation of her

title: The interpretation of seeing wine without drinking it is based on the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing wine without drinking it according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen In dreams, the boundaries and laws of reality are violated and many wonderful details occur, but they are part of reality, such as seeing things that exist in reality and people you know in your real life. These details prompted many scholars to provide Interpretations of dreams, they link the meanings of things that appear in a dream to things that happen in a dream, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing wine without drinking it according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of dreams of seeing wine without drinking it, interpretation of Ibn Sirin, the great scholar and translator believes Ibn Sirin famously said that seeing wine in a dream carries many interpretations and connotations. Seeing wine in a dream indicates the appearance of sorrows and worries in the dreamer, and wine in a dream may indicate the acquisition of forbidden money, which will come to the dreamer without effort. Ibn Sirin says that whoever finds in his dream that he is drinking wine until he gets drunk and goes out of his mind, this is a sign that The dreamer will soon have a lot of money in his hands, but he does not distinguish himself by thanking God for providing it. . He has this money, but if the dreamer finds that he is drunk in a dream, even though he has never drank alcohol, then this dreamer will feel fear and anxiety, but this feeling will disappear very soon. And if the dreamer drank alcohol in his dream, this is evidence that he was eating in an inappropriate way. legitimate. Drinking alcohol can be considered a sign of increasing disagreements with many people and it can be a sign that the fortuneteller will break his covenant with some people or may become crazy and lose his memory. It could be a sign of the misfortune of death or the loss of a loved one, God forbid. Interpretation of dreams about seeing wine without drinking it Interpretation by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation largely agrees with the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, as Al-Nabulsi says that wine in a dream is considered completely repulsive, as it is a harbinger of sadness and suffering for the pioneer, Like vision. . Of wine, it indicates forbidden money, God forbid. Interpretation of dreams about seeing wine without drinking it. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen agrees with both Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi that seeing wine in a dream is a vision that does not bode well at all, as it is considered a sign of forbidden money that he may earn. The dreamer may be a sign of the dreamer. I will. Falling into many sins and disobedience. Interpretation of dreams to see wine without drinking it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man: Interpretation of dreams to see wine without drinking it for a single woman: If a girl sees wine in a dream and does not drink it, this may be a sign that she is distinguished by her bad reputation, or that she She learns of the decline of morals, which is not good at all, and she sees it. Wine without it. Drinking it in a dream may mean that this girl will fall into the evil of strife and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about seeing wine without drinking it for a married woman: Seeing wine in a dream for a married woman indicates her bad reputation and may be evidence of her shortcomings in her parents’ rights and their lack of justice, and it may be any
